channel.title: People help me!
channel.description:
Hi,i use megascape.Before i found out that my server can fit only 5 poeple at one time.So i posted that up and this guys said to put this in in my compile. @echo off COLOR 08 title Arnscape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java JAVA -Xmx1024m server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause
So i did.Than in player handler i changed the maxium players to 50 or something. But now i figuered out that my client.java wont update.But everything else would. Because i wanted to change text in welcome screen and it didnt.Than i wanted to make this guy mod. And i couldnt ,because my client.java wont update. What can be the problem? :mad: :| :mad:

item.title: People help me!
item.dc:creator: @arnelis arnelis
item.description:
@arnelis wrote:

hey this line this is the one i chnaged in,or i should change diffrent one.

public static final int maxPlayers = 50;[br][size=1]Posted at: November 09, 2006, 08:37:37 PM[/size][hr]oh wait ill chec in server.java[br][size=1]Posted at: November 09, 2006, 08:39:08 PM[/size][hr]IN server.java i found thing that said maxconnections and it said 30 and i chnaged it to 50 lemme try it out[br][size=1]Posted at: November 09, 2006, 08:40:54 PM[/size][hr]4 errors apeared

Read full topic

item.title: People help me!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Change the max players (Might be called maxconnections) in server.java to the same thing you changed it in playerhandler.

I can’t believe I forgot about that…

Read full topic

item.title: People help me!
item.dc:creator: @arnelis arnelis
item.description:
@arnelis wrote:

i dont get an error, but people pm on hamachi and say they cant log in. And they always pm me when there is 5 poeple loged in.

Read full topic

What error do you get when a 6th person tries to log on then

if i put that in my server can only hold 5 players max

item.title: People help me!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Put … in… this!!!

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe -cp . *.java
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe server

Read full topic

item.title: People help me!
item.dc:creator: @arnelis arnelis
item.description:
@arnelis wrote:

you mean takeing this out?

JAVA -Xmx1024m server

Read full topic

item.title: People help me!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Try taking out -Xmx entirely, I know for a fact the java.lang.OutOfMemoryError is caused by putting that in there.

Read full topic

item.title: People help me!
item.dc:creator: @arnelis arnelis
item.description:
@arnelis wrote:

I changed that and nothing changed.
but on compile this apeard

Expantation in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: 1024m[br][size=1]Posted at: November 09, 2006, 04:59:35 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

Read full topic

item.title: People help me!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

See the -Xmx thing you put in there? That puts a cap on how much memory the java application your running can use. Take that out and more people will be able to log on. I’m not too sure about the client not updating though…

Read full topic

item.title: People help me!
item.dc:creator: @arnelis arnelis
item.description:
@arnelis wrote:

Hi,i use megascape.Before i found out that my server can fit only 5 poeple at one time.So i posted that up and this guys said to put this in in my compile.
@echo off
COLOR 08
title Arnscape Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
JAVA -Xmx1024m server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe” server
pause

So i did.Than in player handler i changed the maxium players to 50 or something. But now i figuered out that my client.java wont update.But everything else would. Because i wanted to change text in welcome screen and it didnt.Than i wanted to make this guy mod. And i couldnt ,because my client.java wont update. What can be the problem? :mad: :mad:

Read full topic
